title: Halloween Everything - Costumes, Funny Stories, Weekend Plans
itunes:title: Halloween Everything - Costumes, Funny Stories, Weekend Plans
description:
Brooke & Danielle get you prepared for Halloween! The gals share their Highlights and Lowlights, Favorites & Goals of the Week, and share some tips for getting into a festive vibe!
